name: Digital Playground
description:
PlayingCards.io is a website that enables you to play card games with a virtual table online. Digital Playground is a room setup for PlayingCards.io, which can be imported into a room on the site to help you quickly set up an online session for Hackermon.

Colored pegs: used to indicate the position of player characters.
Red marbles: used as counters to track Harms on ICEs.

You have to shuffle cards from the deck with the Jokers manually, unfortunately. When the deck runs out, drag the discard pile to the deck, turn it face-down, and right-click to shuffle the pile; do NOT click "recall and shuffle" under the deck!

The suite icons on above each System is from the Synthwave Playing Card Deck.
